arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho makes feelings clear on Alexander Isak's Newcastle exit - 'Everyone knows'
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho has weighed in on Alexander Isak's summer saga ahead of Benfica's Champions League clash with Newcastle United at St James' Park on Wednesday evening

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe hopes for another ‘electric atmosphere’ against Benfica
arts.sum: I hope that our performance mirrors that crowd energy that we're going to get and I think if we're at our very best, we have a good chance. They bounced back with an emphatic 4-0 rout of Union Saint-Gilloise in their second game of the league phase and need to build momentum to boost hopes of progression.

arts.ttl: Champions League — Newcastle vs. Benfica – Match Preview
arts.sum: Newcastle United host Benfica at St James’ Park on Tuesday aiming to follow up their 4-0 win over Union SG with another step toward the Champions League knockout stage. Eddie Howe’s team lost their opener to Barcelona but responded strongly in Belgium, and a second win would move them closer to qualification. Benfica arrive without […]

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho pays beautiful tribute to Sir Bobby Robson on Newcastle visit
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho's Benfica take on Newcastle at St James' Park in the Champions League on Tuesday, and he spoke about his former mentor, Sir Bobby Robson, during his pre-match press conference

arts.ttl: Newcastle United v Benfica: Youngster catches eye as he’s included in Champions League squad
arts.sum: José Mourinho is taking a touch of youth to St James’ Park. According to A Bola, Benfica have travelled to England with a 25-man squad to face Newcastle United in the Champions League, and one name stands out: Ivan Lima.
